scripts.team-decide: cd team-decide && npm run babel && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.team-search: cd team-search && npm run build:prod && npm run start
scripts.start: concurrently --names 'nginx,page,decide,search' "nginx -c \"`pwd`/webserver/nginx.conf\"" "mfserve --listen 3001 team-page" "npm run team-decide" "npm run team-search" "npm run open -- http://localhost:3000"
